articles.title: With scenes from space, TV series shines light on team fixing spectrometer - CNA
articles.description: LONDON :     Filmmaker Ben Turner has turned his lifelong passion for space exploration into a Disney+ original mini series centred around American astronaut Chris Cassidy. "Among the Stars", a six-episode docuseries, takes viewers behind the scenes with Cass…
articles.content:

articles.author: fin24
articles.title: Anglo appoints Nompumelelo Zikalala as Kumba Iron Ore's first female CEO - News24
articles.description: Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed De Beers' Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO.
articles.content:
Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO. 
Zikalala is currently managing director of De Beers Managed O… [+881 chars]
